awards.title: Invited Talk @ Google (Mountain View) on "Gender and Machine Translation"
awards.description: Invitation from Google to give a talk to their Machine Translation team on "Gender and Machine Translation".

awards.title: Leader of the Winning Team: Shared Task Cross-Genre Gender Prediction in Dutch
awards.description: I assembled a team (consisting of Dimitar Shterionov, Alberto Poncelas (ADAPT, Dublin City University) and Amit Moryossef (Bar Ilan University)) to collaborate on the CLIN 2019 Shared Task for cross-genre gender prediction in Dutch. We had the highest overall score for both in-domain and out-domain.

awards.title: Top Women Tech
awards.description: Selected to attend "Top Women Tech", where 100 talented and ambitious women meet with 14 top international companies.

awards.title: Pytorch Udacity and Facebook Scholarship

awards.description: ACL SRW travel grant sponsored by Roam Analytics to attend the ACL 2018 conference in Melbourne, Australia

awards.title: Best Presentation Award
awards.description: Faculty Research Day for School of Computing and Engineering

awards.title: STSM grant for a one month research stay in Uppsala, Sweden
awards.description: STSMs are short research stays aimed at enabling researchers from COST Countries participating in COST Action IS1312 to visit an institution or research centre in another participating COST Country in order to foster collaboration and carry out research in support of TextLink objectives.
awards.issuer: European Cooperation in Science and Technology (COST Action Number IS1312)

awards.title: The 2015 Faculty of Engineering & Computing Daniel O'Hare PhD Research Scholarship award
awards.description: In honour of the contribution of its founding president Dr Daniel O'Hare, four PhD scholarships are being offered to commence in the 2015-16 academic year. One scholarship will be awarded per DCU Faculty: one in the Faculty of Science and Health, one in the Faculty of Engineering and Computing, one in DCU Business School and one in the Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences
